LanguageData.PUAH.allowCorpsesTooltip: Default Off. Only carry those directly in hands instead.
LanguageData.PUAH.allowAnimals: Allow tamed pack animals using their inventory for hauling
LanguageData.PUAH.allowAnimalsTooltip: Default On. Works best with mods that give backpacks to more animals, like VFME Caravan Packs
LanguageData.PUAH.allowMechanoids: Allow hacked mechanoids using their inventory for hauling
LanguageData.PUAH.allowMechanoidsTooltip: Requires What The Hack or similar mods. Default On.
LanguageData.PUAH.minimumFreeInventorySpace: Minimum free inventory space to consider hauling to inventory
LanguageData.PUAH.minimumFreeInventorySpaceTooltip: Pawns with less free inventory space than defined here just directly use vanilla hauling. 0% makes them always try hauling to inventory, regardless of them having room for more than one potato or not. 100% results in PUAH requiring pawns to be completely naked. Default 20%
